suggest.meta_keywords: HTTP/2, HTTP/2 benefits, server push, HTTP header compression, multiplexing requests, resource prioritization, front-end optimization, Azion HTTP/2, web performance improvement, modern web protocols
suggest.meta_description: Explore the benefits of HTTP/2, including server push, header compression, and multiplexing for enhanced web performance, all supported by Azion since 2018.

current.meta_description: The HTTP/2 standard was approved in February 2015 and is considered the biggest upgrade of the HTTP protocol in 15 years.
